commit_message: Disable SB filter

Fix the display of top1 or top2 allele in VCF while the variant is
DELETION. Also, remove those problematic INDEL where a DEL follows an
INSERTION.
Set timeout for multiprocessing tasks -- at most 5mins per base

Correct the way to report inconsistency between chromosome names in treatment and control BAM files. Let multiprocessing module work even while NP is 1. Set timeout for sub taskes from multiprocessing module.
Fix bug: key error while new nt appears in control data.
fix bug for merging dels
fix bug: now can merge >2 deletions

Merge nearby deletions; if a peak fails assembly due to too many
mismatches, we skip this peak;
Bug fix: do not allow zero treatment tag coverage
Fix multiprocessing call
Change alignment scoring to BLASTN default. Will do local assembly and recalculate any reference-based 0/1  loci.
Remove declaration in for loop
Update smith waterman alignment to allow affine gap penalty. (implementation based on jalign)
Tweak filtering on read counts.
Detect and disgard reads with alternative nt at the tips (the first or the last nt of a read).
Fix multiprocessing
1. Fix multiprocessing; 2. Skip if there is no read depth on ChIP data

Auto-assemble now becomes default: 1) SAPPER will invoke fermi-lite when
it discovers INDEL in a peak region; then it will assemble DNA
sequences to refine alignments. 2) Filtering method is fixed to throw
out the low frequent (by default <2 ) alternative allele.
Remove duplicate reads
1. Make control file optional; 2. fix binomial test code
add Prob.pyx to calculate binom p
Set Q cutoff as 20. Implement strand bias checker.
Fix calling w/o assembly
Fix multiprocessing typo bug

Turn fermi-lite back on by default. Implement extra rounds of assembly
to recover as more unitigs as possible.
7/28 work
Fix: math error
Turn off fermi by default. Fix variant calling without using local assembly strategy.

Fix: BIC calculation. More conservative way to decide minimum overlap
length for fermi to make initial assembly.
Fix: skip if top1+top2 nt in treatment is zero.
Fix: pass correct parameters to multithread tasks
Fix GQ, PL calculations. Remove old fermi codes. Change default parameters.
Fix bug while unitigs are mapped to - strand.
Fix assembly code: QUAL+33 for fermi-lite.
Use fermi-lite instead of fermi for local assembly.
Use fermi-lite instead of fermi for local assembly.
Fix bug while extracting qual from UnitigRACollection.
Refine header of VCF output.
Comment out debugging prints
Fix bug calculating left and right pos of unitig.
Fix a bug to correctly assign mutation type Insertion.

Fix a bug related to using the khash function. Sometimes it causes an
out-of-bound segment fault.
Fix bug while computing start and end for get_REFSEQ functions
Fix compiling bug

Fully implemented assembly based variant calling, including SNV,
insertion and deletion calls.
remove Makefile for fermi
Add option to turn off/on local assembly thru Fermi
Fix a Fermi out-of-boundary bug
Fix bug on calculating top12NTRatio; skip 0/0 alleles to speed up process
Embeded Fermi to do local assembly and read filtering.
Change multiprocessing behavior
Accelerate numpy operations in Stat.pyx.
Multiple processing support
Use order of chromosomes in BAM and ignore the order in peak file.
rm
Python3 implementation
For SNV filtering by read depth, use raw depth

min_merge_len is from fermi2; do not include this parameter now
Update README.rst

Simplify the idea to only wrap fermi assemble() function in
fork()/child process.
Use fork() to protect main process.
Use thread to protect the main process while calling fermi, in case the fermi process fails.
The suggestion for the ratio of min_overlap is 0.8 for short reads.
Remove debug info. Tweak min_merge_len.
Add fermi2 feature: the requirement for the minimum overlap length to merge

Fix compilation errors/bugs. Ask for c++11 features to run to_string.

Use remove() to delete temporary files instead of making system
calls. Reformat date string in output vcf file (month and date will be
correctly displayed). Rephrase error msg in io.cpp and output msg in
both io.cpp and call.cpp.
Get rid of SAPPER_fermi executable. Call fermi functions directly in SAPPER.
